title: How did it started ?
description: Founded in 2021 and based in Kochi, Kerala, India is a dynamic startup dedicated to transforming the gaming & esports industry. Backed by strong, experienced members and top talent from around the globe, we are supported by a passionate community of gamers and industry leaders. Together, we aim to shape the future of gaming and esports with innovation and excellence.

title: Our Mission
description: Our mission is to elevate the Global gaming industry 10x growth . We want to increase user engagement and users by 5x and building multiple monetizing opportunities for gamers, esports athletes, creators, streamers, and others. Our goal is to be the Best platform for brands and organizations to easily connect with the gaming community and showcase their products, attain more traction. By developing   innovative features in our platform, along with a focus on building strong relationships, we are dedicated to empowering the gaming world and setting a new standard for esports and gaming as the fastest-growing industry in the world.

title: Our Vision
description: Our vision to be the worldâ€™s leading platform that transforms the gaming ecosystem by empowering gamers, esports athletes, creators, and streamers with limitless opportunities. We envision a future where brands and organizations seamlessly connect with the gaming community, achieving unmatched engagement and impact. Through continuous innovation, strong partnerships, and a commitment to excellence, we aim to set the gold standard for esports and gaming, driving its growth as the most dynamic and influential industry globally.
